heaviest_rainfall.status: Record-breaking rain fell on 04 January 2025 with a total accumulation of 36.8mm over 37.2 hours and falling at a rate of 4.6mm per hour at times.

heaviest_rainrate.status: The heaviest rain rate registered stands at 27.0mm per hour on 02 September 2025, highlighting an extreme precipitation event.  21.19mm fell during the storm over 15.0 hours.

longest_rain.status: On 04 January 2025, the rain lasted for 37.2 hours, which is the longest time recorded by our database.  36.8mm accumulated and it fell at 4.6mm per hour at times.

storm.status: There is a storm around.  It's the first significant stormy weather event since 04 September 2025.

top_10_dry.status: The longest dry period started on 24 April 2025 and lasted for 19 days.

top_10_rainy.status: The longest rainy period started on 30 November 2024 and lasted for 10 days.

cold_snaps.status: There is not an active cold snap.  There has been 6 so far this year, while the average is 3.7.

extreme.status: The largest temperature gap recorded is 26.7°C (0.4 - 27.1°C) on 29 April 2025.

heatwaves.status: There is not an active heatwaves.  There has been 6 so far this year, while the average is 1.9.

tropical: The most recent tropical night was on 18 July 2025 and this has only occurred 62 times since 1973.

average.status: The current wind direction is southerly (185°), which differs from the average south-westerly (234.0°) by approximately 49.0 degrees.    In the UK, a southerly wind usually brings milder, moist air from the Atlantic.

gusts.status: The highest wind gust ever seen was 93.7 mph on 13 October 2012.

run.status: The top recorded wind run is 1754 miles on 21 October 2012.

speed.status: The record wind speed remains at 93.7 mph from 13 October 2012.

top_10_windy.status: The longest windy period started on 11 October 2012 and lasted for 21 days.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, pleasant humidity levels and near calm conditions. Drizzle or light rain possible, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and sunlight levels will peak at very high intensity. Similar weather conditions should remain.
